title: About a Lag
body: Guys  I have Very Bad FPS lag in Game :(  how to fix that? please tell me :/

replies.body:
FPS issues can generally be caused by a handful of factors, the most common being poorly performing drivers and windows power settings. Working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) is a great place to start in resolving this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
